total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the number 7 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the direction of the pattern rotation based on the examples.
Q3: Rotate the pattern in the input grid according to the direction determined in Q2.
Q4: Replace the original pattern in the input grid with the rotated pattern to generate the output grid.
